content.question: Which of the following can be inferred from information in the note?

choices.label: Da Jie will be away from home for an extended period.
Da Jie has recently asked Xiao Mei to move into her house to take care of her.
Where Da Jie lives, trash is collected once a week.
Where Da Jie lives, different types of recyclables do not need to be disposed of separately.

content.answer: Where Da Jie lives, different types of recyclables do not need to be disposed of separately.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
